text: Mi isuyya lameo, a d yini Cciian: "Oebbi, d uuee, Iweaad awen lemaahda n tidep. Weaade$ awen, $uoe$ kwen. Ur sai$ adabu fellawen, siwa anecced nnwen. Tu$em awal iw. Ur iyi plummut, lummet iman nnwen. Ur zmire$ a kwen aawne$, ur tezmirem ad iyi taawnem. Nekoe$ wid iyi tepcarakem, zik. I imednas, s tidep, aaaqeb aqeoean
